data.title: Villas with Pool in Sant'antonio Di Gallura, Italy
data.meta_description: Rent a villa with a pool in Sant'antonio Di Gallura for your next vacation in Italy. Vacation rentals with pools in Sant'antonio Di Gallura are perfect for family holidays. Results 41 - 60 of 72.
data.text:
Description

Property Summary:

The Gravina Resort is a 2-family semi-detached house named "Villa 27", constructed in 2010. It offers a Vacation rental opportunity in a tranquil, sunny, and elevated location, situated 2 km from the sea amidst the countryside setting. Guests can enjoy access to a shared property spanning 1,000 sq.m., complete with a seasonal swimming pool (70 sq.m., depth 120 - 120 cm, available from March 31 to October 27). The resort provides amenities such as reception, internet access, and WiFi. Parking is available on the premises, and the property is conveniently located 1 km from shops, groceries, and 2 km from a sandy beach. Please note that having a car is recommended for your stay.

Outdoors:

The Gravina Resort is nestled within a natural park, immersed in the Mediterranean scrub. The buildings seamlessly blend into the surroundings, camouflaged among the unmistakable granite rocks that characterize this stretch of coastline, preserving the natural beauty of the area.

Other Information:

The property is located in proximity to animals in the neighborhood.

Distances and Attractions:

Nearby attractions and distances include:

- Shops: 1 km

- Grocery stores: 1 km

- Sandy beach: 2 km Costa Paradiso 365

Description

Property Summary

Gravina Resort is a comfortable, detached villa named "Nove" located in a quiet, sunny, and elevated position in Costa Paradiso, Trinità D'agultu, Italy. This holiday rental boasts an impressive array of amenities, including a shared natural state property, garden plants and flowers, a seasonal swimming pool (70 m2, available from March 31st to October 27th), and parking for up to 3 cars directly at the villa. Enjoy the convenience of having a shop and grocery store within 1 km, while the sandy "Li Cossi" beach is just 2.5 km away.

Outdoors

The villa is surrounded by beautiful natural surroundings, featuring a shared garden with plants and flowers. Guests can indulge in refreshing dips in the shared seasonal swimming pool, measuring 70 m2 and available from March 31st to October 27th. The property offers ample parking space, accommodating up to 3 cars right at the villa.

Other Information

Please note that a car is highly recommended for your stay at Gravina Resort. The property is located in a quiet, sunny, and elevated position, approximately 1.2 km from the center of Costa Paradiso, 35 km from the center of Santa Teresa, and 38 km from the center of Tempio Pasania. While enjoying the tranquility of the surroundings, be aware that animals may be present in the neighborhood.

Distances and Attractions

Gravina Resort is conveniently situated near several attractions and amenities. The sandy "Li Cossi" beach is just 2.5 km away, providing easy access to the beautiful coastline. Additionally, Traghetto Olbia, a nearby attraction, is located 85 km from the property. A shop and grocery store are within 1 km, ensuring you have easy access to essential supplies during your stay. Costa Paradiso 380

Description

Property Summary

Gravina Resort is a beautiful and cozy 2-family house built in 2010. It offers a well-kept garden of 700 m2 and a kidney-shaped swimming pool (45 m2, seasonal availability: 01.Jan. - 31.Dec.) for shared use. The property features a terrace, roof terrace, and parking for 3 cars. It is an ideal vacation rental or holiday rental for those seeking a relaxing getaway.

Outdoors

The resort boasts a well-maintained outdoor area with a spacious 700 m2 garden shared among the guests. Enjoy the refreshing kidney-shaped swimming pool, measuring 45 m2, which is available for use throughout the year (01.Jan. - 31.Dec.). An outdoor shower and terrace provide additional conveniences for soaking up the sun and enjoying the fresh air.

Other Information

The property includes a roof terrace, offering stunning views and a perfect spot for outdoor lounging or dining. Parking is available on-site, accommodating up to 3 cars. Please note that animals may be present in the neighborhood.

Distances and Attractions

Gravina Resort is conveniently located just 1.2 km from the center of Costa Paradiso and within driving distance of other notable destinations, such as 35 km from the center of Santa Teresa and 38 km from the center of Tempio. Situated in a sunny, elevated position on a slope in the countryside, the resort is only 2 km away from the sea. Nearby amenities include a shop (1 km), restaurant (1 km), and the ferry "Olbia" at 85 km distance. Sandy beaches are a mere 2.5 km away, beckoning visitors to enjoy the beautiful coastline of Trinità D'agultu, Italy. Costa Paradiso 390

Description

Property Summary

Bouganville is a large and cozy villa that offers a perfect vacation rental experience in Badesi, Italy. The property comprises a main house and an outbuilding set in a quiet and sunny location, just 1 km from the center of Badesi and 4 km from the sea. It boasts a spacious 5,000 square meter garden with flowers, trees, and a seasonal swimming pool (10 x 5 m, depth 150 - 190 cm, available from May 1 to October 12). The villa also features garden furniture, a barbecue area, and ample parking on the premises.

Outdoors

The property's outdoor space is truly remarkable, featuring a vast 5,000 square meter garden adorned with beautiful flowers and trees. It provides a serene and tranquil environment for guests to unwind and enjoy the sunny Italian climate. The highlight of the outdoor area is the seasonal swimming pool, measuring 10 x 5 meters with a depth ranging from 150 to 190 cm, available from May 1 to October 12. Guests can lounge by the pool, soak up the sun, and create lasting memories with loved ones. Additionally, the garden is equipped with comfortable furniture and a barbecue area, providing the perfect setting for alfresco dining and entertaining.

Other Information

The property offers convenient amenities, including Internet WiFi access, allowing guests to stay connected during their stay. Nearby, you'll find a supermarket, restaurant, and bar within 1.5 km, catering to all your essential needs. The sandy beach "Li Junchi" is just 4 km away, offering the opportunity to enjoy the beautiful Sardinian coastline. While the property's location is peaceful, a car is recommended for exploring the area's attractions and amenities.

Distances and Attractions

Badesi offers a range of nearby attractions worth exploring during your holiday rental stay. The charming town of Isola Rossa is just 12 km away, while the picturesque Castelsardo is situated 23 km from the property. These destinations offer a glimpse into the region's rich history, culture, and natural beauty. Additionally, the property's proximity to the sandy beach "Li Junchi," at just 4 km away, provides the perfect opportunity for relaxing beach days and water activities. Bouganville

Description

Property Summary

Situated in Badesi, Italy, La Vigna 2 offers a cosy and comfortable holiday rental experience. This charming village is conveniently located just 400 meters from the town center, offering a central and peaceful setting. Enjoy the convenience of a shared swimming pool, perfect for cooling off during the warm summer months. The property also boasts a yard and parking facilities for added convenience.

Outdoors

Embrace the great outdoors at La Vigna 2, where you can indulge in a refreshing dip in the shared 15 x 7-meter swimming pool with a depth of 140 cm. A separate children's pool caters to the little ones, ensuring family-friendly fun. Soak up the warmth with an outdoor shower, and take advantage of the ample parking spaces provided.

Other Information

La Vigna 2 offers a prime location, just 3.5 kilometers from the sandy beach of Li Jiunchi, making it an ideal vacation rental for beach enthusiasts. Conveniences such as a supermarket, restaurant, and bar are within a short distance, adding to the overall enjoyment of your stay.

Distances and Attractions

La Vigna 2 is ideally situated for exploring the surrounding attractions. Valledoria is just 9 kilometers away, while Castelsardo and Costa Paradiso are both within 20 kilometers. Olbia and Porto Torres are accessible at 80 and 50 kilometers, respectively, and Stintino is a scenic 70-kilometer drive away. With so many captivating destinations within reach, this holiday rental offers endless opportunities for exploration and adventure. Peonia

Description

Property Summary

Welcome to Villa Vigna 1, a cozy and comfortable holiday rental in Badesi, Italy. Offering a serene residential setting surrounded by villas, this charming property boasts a swimming pool, yard, and ample parking facilities. Ideally situated just 500 meters from the town center, it provides a tranquil oasis while being conveniently close to local amenities.

Outdoors

Immerse yourself in the sunny ambiance and relish the shared swimming pool, measuring 10 x 8 meters with a depth of 140 cm. Families will appreciate the dedicated children's pool, allowing little ones to safely enjoy the water. Take advantage of the on-site parking for your convenience.

Other Information

For your daily needs, a supermarket is located a mere 500 meters away, while restaurants and bars are within a 400-meter radius, ensuring easy access to local dining and entertainment options. The nearest sandy beach, "Li junchi," is a short 3.5 km drive, making it an ideal choice for those seeking a beach vacation.

Distances and Attractions

Explore the surrounding region with ease, as Badesi offers proximity to several must-visit attractions. Castelsardo, a picturesque town, is just 20 km away, while Valledoria and Costa Paradiso are accessible at distances of 9 km and 20 km, respectively. For those interested in venturing further, Olbia is 80 km away, Porto Torres is 50 km, and Stintino is 70 km from the property. Please note that having a car is recommended to fully experience the area's offerings. Pandora

Description

Property Summary

Consider Casa Ceri in Badesi, Italy, a charming vacation rental property that combines modern amenities with beautiful surroundings. This apartment complex boasts 24 units, each offering a terrace, garden furniture, and a barbecue area for your enjoyment. Relax by the shared swimming pool (5 x 10 m, available seasonally from June 1st to September 30th) or take advantage of the convenient on-site parking. With Internet Wifi and a yard, this property ensures a comfortable and connected stay.

Outdoors

Immerse yourself in the sunny position of Lu Muntiggioni, just 3 km from the center of Badesi. The property's prime location allows easy access to the sandy beach "Li Junchi," situated only 4 km away. Savor the Mediterranean ambiance while lounging in the garden or hosting a delightful barbecue on the terrace.

Other Information

Casa Ceri is conveniently located near various amenities, including a supermarket (3.5 km), restaurant (3.6 km), and bar (400 m). While a car is recommended for exploring the area, motor access to the property is available within 2 meters. Enjoy the flexibility of your holiday rental while experiencing the charm of this Sardinian destination.

Distances and Attractions

In addition to the nearby beach, Casa Ceri offers easy access to several captivating attractions. Explore the picturesque town of Isola Rossa, just 15 km away, or venture to the historic Castelsardo, situated 20 km from the property. For those seeking natural beauty, the Costa Paradiso is a mere 20 km drive, while the town of Valledoria is conveniently located 6 km away. Alghero, a renowned coastal city, is also within reach at 86 km from the property. Emma

Description

Property Summary

Experience a cosy and comfortable holiday rental in the "Vigna 1" village located just 500 meters from the center of Badesi, Italy. Nestled in a quiet and sunny residential area of villas, this property offers a serene escape, yet remains conveniently situated just 3.5 kilometers from the sea. Enjoy shared amenities including a swimming pool (10 x 8 meters, depth of 140 cm, available seasonally from June 15th to September 15th), a children's pool, and parking facilities both at the house and public areas nearby.

Outdoors

Soak up the sun and relish the great outdoors during your stay at this Badesi vacation rental. The property boasts a shared swimming pool, perfect for refreshing dips on warm days, and a designated children's pool, ensuring a fun and safe environment for your little ones. Additionally, you'll have access to parking facilities both at the house and in nearby public areas, providing convenience and peace of mind during your stay.

Other Information

Enhance your holiday experience with the nearby amenities and conveniences surrounding the "Vigna 1" village. A supermarket is just 500 meters away, catering to your grocery needs. Indulge in local cuisine at the restaurant located 400 meters from the property, or unwind with a refreshing beverage at the nearby bar. For those seeking sandy beaches, a beautiful stretch awaits just 3.5 kilometers from your doorstep.

Distances and Attractions

Embark on exciting adventures and explore the captivating attractions in the vicinity of your Badesi vacation rental. The charming town of Castelsardo is a mere 20-minute drive away, while Valledoria can be reached in just 9 minutes. Nature enthusiasts will delight in the stunning Costa Paradiso, only 20 minutes from the property. Olbia, a vibrant city, is situated 80 minutes away, offering a wealth of cultural and entertainment options. Discover the rich history of Porto Torres, a 50-minute drive, or venture to the picturesque town of Stintino, located 70 minutes from your holiday rental. Please note that having a car is recommended to fully explore and appreciate the surrounding areas. Ortensia

Description

Property Summary

Villa Badus is a beautifully designed resort located in Badesi, Italy, boasting a well-maintained garden with lush lawns and vibrant plants. The property features 51 apartments spread across two houses, each with two stories. As a guest, you'll have access to an array of amenities, including two round swimming pools (7m in diameter and 170cm deep) available seasonally from April 6th to October 14th. Additionally, there is a separate children's pool, an outdoor shower, a boccia court, a terrace with garden furniture, a barbecue area, and a children's playground. The resort offers a seamless vacation rental experience with on-site facilities like a reception, a restaurant, a bar, a lounge with TV, internet access, WiFi, shopping facilities, and a boutique. Guests can also take advantage of the laundry facilities (for a fee) and opt for breakfast or half-board meals upon request (extra charge). Airport transfers are available for an additional cost.

Outdoors

The resort boasts a well-kept garden with lush lawns and vibrant plants, creating a serene outdoor environment for guests to enjoy. Two round swimming pools, each 7 meters in diameter and 170 centimeters deep, are available for seasonal use from April 6th to October 14th. A separate children's pool ensures a safe and enjoyable swimming experience for the little ones. Guests can also take advantage of the outdoor shower, boccia court, terrace with garden furniture, and a barbecue area for alfresco dining and entertainment. The children's playground provides a fun and engaging space for kids to play and explore.

Other Information

The resort offers a range of convenient on-site facilities, including a reception area, a restaurant, a bar, and a lounge with a TV. Guests can stay connected with internet access and WiFi provided throughout the property. Shopping facilities and a boutique are available for those seeking retail therapy. Additionally, laundry facilities are available for shared use (extra charge). For those seeking a hassle-free vacation experience, the resort offers airport transfers for an additional fee. The complex is divided into two parts by a side-street with light traffic.

Distances and Attractions

Villa Badus is conveniently located just 200 meters from the center of Badesi, a charming town in Italy. It is situated 38 kilometers from the center of Sassari and 80 kilometers from the center of Olbia. Guests can enjoy the nearby sandy beach "Li Junchi," which is only 3.5 kilometers away. The property is also in close proximity to various amenities, including a supermarket (250 meters), a restaurant (150 meters), and a bus stop "Badesi - Badesi Mare" (200 meters). For those arriving by ferry, the "Porto Torres" ferry terminal is 55 kilometers away. The resort offers easy access with a 40-meter long bumpy motor access and ample parking available at the house. Badesi 623

Description

Property Summary

Nestled in the countryside of Badesi, Italy, the "Mare di Ginepri" resort offers a tranquil escape with its 10 houses built in 2012. Enjoy shared amenities including a swimming pool (above ground, 9 x 4 m, seasonal availability: 15.May. - 31.Oct.), a yard surrounded by natural landscapes and plants, and on-site parking facilities, making it an ideal vacation rental for those seeking a relaxing getaway.

Outdoors

Immerse yourself in the natural beauty of the "Mare di Ginepri" resort, where you'll find a shared swimming pool (above ground, 9 x 4 m, seasonal availability: 15.May. - 31.Oct.) surrounded by lush greenery and plants. The property boasts a natural state with meticulously maintained gardens, providing a serene atmosphere for outdoor relaxation.

Other Information

The resort is conveniently located just 2.5 km from the center of Badesi and 300 m from the sandy "Badesi Mare" beach. For those seeking adventure, the town of Castelsardo is 22 km away, and the city of Olbia is 75 km from the property. The ferry port of "Porto Torres" is 55 km away, offering easy access to nearby islands and destinations.

Distances and Attractions

Explore the charming surroundings of the "Mare di Ginepri" resort, where you'll find a wealth of nearby attractions. The sandy "Badesi Mare" beach is just 300 m away, perfect for soaking up the sun and enjoying the crystal-clear waters. The town of Badesi, with its local shops and restaurants, is a mere 2.5 km from the resort. For those seeking cultural experiences, the town of Castelsardo, known for its rich history and picturesque streets, is 22 km away. Additionally, the city of Olbia, a vibrant hub for shopping, dining, and entertainment, is 75 km from the property. Mare Di Ginepri (bad115)

Description

Property Summary

Casa Scalitti e La Pitraia is a rustic residence located in the district of Badesi Mare, just 1 km from the center of Badesi, Italy. This vacation rental offers 24 houses within the complex, providing ample accommodation options. The property boasts a shared swimming pool (above ground, 110 m2), available seasonally from May 15 to October 31, perfect for refreshing dips during your stay. Enjoy the natural surroundings with a private natural garden and state property. Parking is conveniently available at the house, allowing you to explore the area with ease.

Outdoors

Immerse yourself in the serene countryside setting of Casa Scalitti e La Pitraia. The property features a natural state property and a private natural garden, offering a tranquil escape from the hustle and bustle of daily life. Take advantage of the shared swimming pool, spanning 110 square meters and available for use from May 15 to October 31, providing a refreshing respite during the warmer months.

Other Information

Casa Scalitti e La Pitraia offers convenient amenities for your stay. A restaurant is located within the complex, allowing you to savor delectable local cuisine without venturing too far. The property is situated 1.9 km from the sandy beach of Badesi Mare, making it an ideal base for beach lovers. Please note that a car is recommended for optimal mobility during your visit.

Distances and Attractions

Casa Scalitti e La Pitraia is strategically located near various attractions and points of interest. The center of Castelsardo is just 20 km away, while the center of Olbia is 75 km from the property. The ferry terminal at Porto Torres is conveniently accessible at a distance of 52 km. Additionally, the sandy beach of Badesi Mare is a mere 1.9 km away, providing easy access to the beautiful coastline during your holiday rental stay. Badesi 622

Description

Property Summary

This "Oliviola" cottage offers a peaceful and tranquil vacation rental experience in Santa Maria Coghinas, Italy. Surrounded by meadows, fields, and a large garden with wildlife, trees, and a courtyard, the property comprises a main house and an outbuilding. Enjoy the seasonal outdoor swimming pool (10 x 5 m, depth 150 cm) from April 15 to October 15, along with a terrace and garden furniture. The cottage features Internet Wi-Fi, parking for four cars on the premises, and a yard.

Outdoors

Immerse yourself in the serene countryside setting with a large garden teeming with wildlife and trees, a meadow, and a courtyard. Relax by the seasonal swimming pool (10 x 5 m, depth 150 cm), available from April 15 to October 15. Enjoy al fresco dining on the terrace with garden furniture, providing the perfect spot to soak in the natural surroundings.

Other Information

The property offers convenient amenities, including a shop, supermarket, restaurant, and bar within 2 km. The "Baia delle Mimose" sandy beach is just 7 km away, and the ferry to "Porto Torres" is 51 km from the cottage. Please note that a car is recommended due to the 300 m long bumpy motor access to the house via an unmade road.

Distances and Attractions

Situated in a secluded and sunny position at the foot of Coghinas, the cottage is 7 km from the center of Valledoria, 22 km from the center of Castelsardo, and 52 km from the center of Sassari. Nearby attractions include the river situated 150 m away and the "Baia delle Mimose" sandy beach, which is 7 km from the property. Oliviola

Description

Property Summary

Villa Giardini d'Aldia is a comfortable, detached house that offers a well-appointed vacation rental experience. Nestled in a residential area just 975 meters from the sea, this property boasts a private, terraced garden spanning 1,200 square meters, complete with a lawn, trees, and a seasonal swimming pool (available from April 1st to October 31st). With amenities like internet Wi-Fi, parking on-site, and a yard, you'll have everything you need for a comfortable stay in San Teodoro, Italy.

Outdoors

Immerse yourself in the beauty of Villa Giardini d'Aldia's outdoor spaces. The fenced garden invites you to relax on the terrace with garden furniture, or fire up the barbecue for an alfresco dining experience. Take a refreshing dip in the 6x6 meter swimming pool, or rinse off in the outdoor shower after a day of exploring the nearby beaches.

Other Information

For your convenience, Villa Giardini d'Aldia is located just 1 kilometer from a supermarket, making it easy to stock up on essentials. If you're seeking additional attractions, a 9-hole golf course is situated 2 kilometers away, and the Olbia ferry terminal is within a 24-kilometer radius.

Distances and Attractions

While staying at Villa Giardini d'Aldia, you'll be just 975 meters from the sandy "Lu Impostu" beach and 2 kilometers from a marina. The property is situated 7 kilometers from the center of San Teodoro and 22 kilometers from the center of Olbia. Nearby attractions include the ferry terminal at Olbia, just 24 kilometers away, and a 9-hole golf course within a 2-kilometer radius. Ville Giardnini D'aldia (teo458)

Description

Property Summary

Immerse yourself in the tranquility of the "Omer," a spacious and cozy 2-family house nestled in the hamlet of Lu Impostu, just 8 km from the heart of San Teodoro, Italy. This vacation rental boasts a sunny position in a residential area surrounded by villas, a mere 150 m from the inviting sea. With a private, well-maintained garden adorned with lush lawns, an above-ground swimming pool (5 x 3 m, depth 120 cm, seasonal availability: 01.May. - 30.Sep.), and ample parking at the house, it offers a perfect retreat for your holiday escape.

Outdoors

This property offers an idyllic outdoor experience. Bask in the sun and enjoy alfresco dining in the beautifully landscaped garden, complete with a refreshing outdoor shower and a table tennis setup for added entertainment. The verdant lawn creates a serene ambiance, inviting you to relax and soak in the Mediterranean atmosphere.

Other Information

Convenience is at your fingertips with a supermarket just 2.5 km away, a restaurant within a 60 m stroll, and a bar situated 2 km from the property. The sandy beach of "Lu Impostu" is a mere 150 m away, beckoning you to indulge in sun-soaked days by the water's edge.

Distances and Attractions

Explore the surrounding area with its array of nearby attractions. Puntaldia, a popular destination, is just 1.6 km away, while Cala Brandinchi, known for its breathtaking coves, is within a 6 km radius. Porto San Paolo, a charming seaside town, is a 10 km drive, and the vibrant city of Olbia is located 24 km from the property. Please note that having a car is recommended to fully experience the region's offerings. Omer

Description

Property Summary

Villa Puntaldia is a beautiful and comfortable holiday rental located in San Teodoro, Italy. It offers a large, well-kept garden with a lawn, plants, and a sunbathing area. Enjoy the seasonal swimming pool (25 x 10 m) from June 15 to September 15. Additional amenities include an outdoor shower, tennis court (extra fee), and a children's playground. The complex also features a bar, bistro, shopping facilities, and a boutique.

Outdoors

The property boasts a spacious, shared garden that is not fenced, allowing you to relax and soak in the natural surroundings. The garden features lush lawns and beautiful plants, providing the perfect setting for outdoor activities or simply lounging in the sun. The highlight is the seasonal swimming pool, measuring 25 x 10 meters, available from June 15 to September 15.

Other Information

The complex offers convenient amenities, including a bar, bistro, shopping facilities, and a boutique, ensuring that all your needs are met during your stay. The property has a 20-meter motor access, making it easily accessible. Additionally, a supermarket is located just 200 meters away, and the sandy beach is a short 300-meter walk.

Distances and Attractions

Villa Puntaldia is ideally situated near various attractions and conveniences. The Olbia - Costa Smeralda Airport is only 23 km away, and the Porto Isola Bianca marina is 30 km from the property. Golf enthusiasts will appreciate the 9-hole golf course located just 300 meters away. While a car is recommended for exploring the area, the property's proximity to the beach, marina, and other attractions makes it an excellent base for your vacation. San Teodoro 733

Description

Property Summary

Located in the district of Capo Coda Cavallo, 12 km from San Teodoro's center and 650 m from the sea, Le Farfalle is an ideal holiday rental for those seeking a peaceful getaway. This development boasts a shared swimming pool (49 m in diameter, available seasonally from June 1 to September 30) and a tennis court (additional charges apply). The property features a private garden with wildlife and trees, an outdoor shower, and a barbecue area. Amenities include a washing machine, Internet Wifi, parking, and access to the tennis court.

Outdoors

The property offers a private garden (not fenced) with wildlife and trees, perfect for relaxation and outdoor activities. Enjoy the convenience of an outdoor shower and a barbecue area for al fresco dining. Please note that access to the house is via a 100 m long unmade road, and there is a stepped path leading to the property.

Other Information

Parking is available approximately 20 m away, but it is important to note that the parking space or garage can only accommodate small to medium-sized cars. The nearest supermarket is 12 km away, while restaurants and bars are located 6 km from the property. The sandy beach "Cala Suaraccia" is just 650 m away, offering easy access to the beautiful coastline.

Distances and Attractions

Nearby attractions include Cala Brandinchi (5 km), Monte Petrosu (6.5 km), Porto Taverna (9 km), and Olbia (23 km). While the property is conveniently located near these points of interest, a car is recommended for easy exploration and accessibility. Vanessa

Description

Property Summary

This holiday rental is a spacious House "Sergio" that can accommodate up to 18 guests. It offers a prime location just 150 meters from the sandy beach and provides plenty of amenities for a comfortable stay. The property boasts a private fenced garden spanning 500 square meters, complete with trees and a natural garden area. Additionally, it features a seasonal swimming pool (5 x 10 meters) available from April 1st to November 24th, perfect for enjoying the warm weather. For families with children, there is a playground with a swing on-site. While the property is accessible via an unmade road, a car is recommended for convenience.

Outdoors

The outdoor space is truly a highlight of this property. You'll have access to a private, fenced garden spanning 500 square meters, offering ample space for relaxation and outdoor activities. The garden features trees and a natural garden area, creating a tranquil and serene environment. Furthermore, the property boasts a seasonal swimming pool measuring 5 x 10 meters, available from April 1st to November 24th, ideal for cooling off during the warmer months.

Other Information

To ensure a comfortable stay, the property provides baby equipment for families traveling with young children. Additionally, various amenities are within close proximity, including a grocery store and supermarket just 1 kilometer away, and a restaurant conveniently located 300 meters from the property.

Distances and Attractions

This holiday rental is located in the picturesque town of Valledoria, Italy, and offers a prime location just 150 meters from the sandy beach. For those interested in outdoor activities, a tennis court is situated a mere 50 meters away, making it easy to enjoy a game or two during your stay. While the property is accessible via an unmade road, it's recommended to have a car for added convenience in exploring the surrounding area and nearby attractions. Sergio
